name: sheffield
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in northern England: The was set in Sheffield, a former steel centre. He took the midday train from Kings Cross Station to Sheffield.
More examplesFewer examplesShe comes from Sheffield.He won his first snooker tournament at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield in 2002.After going to Sheffield University she worked in a London store.
